title: Date Range Picker
description: Allows to easily select dates or range of dates

title: Slider
description: Select a date or numeric value

title: Range Slider
description: Select a date or numeric range

title: Range Selector
description: Visualize data and select a date or numeric range

title: Barcodes
description: Generate and display data in machine-readable 1D and 2D barcodes

title: PDF
description: Create PDF document with text, images and tables

title: Cartesian Charts
description: Plot over 30 chart types ranging from line charts to financial charts

subItems.title: Default line chart
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates the default line chart. Marker, tooltip and legend are enabled in this sample. Tap the marker to view information about that data point in a tooltip.

subItems.title: Line with dashes
subItems.description: Line chart is rendered with dashes in this sample.

subItems.title: Multi-colored line
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates the rendering of a line chart with multiple colors. Colors for each data point is mapped from the data source.

subItems.title: Modified axis base
subItems.description: This sample is achieved using the axis crossing feature. X-axis 'crossAt' value is set to -2 and hence the data points are rendering from -2. Default axis base value is 0 and on that case, positive points will render upwards and negative points will render downwards.

subItems.title: Back to back column
subItems.description: By default, the columns of various series are placed side by side. In this sample, it is changed to render back to back

subItems.title: Column with track
subItems.description: This sample renders the column chart with track. Track is a rectangular bar drawn from minimum to maximum values of an axis.

subItems.title: Column width and spacing
subItems.description: You can change the width and spacing of columns by using the options in the properties panel.

subItems.title: Customized column chart
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates the rendering of custom columns. Here, the top edges of the columns are changed to form a triangle.

subItems.title: Spline types
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates various types of splines. Type can be changed by modifying the options in the properties panel.

subItems.title: Modified axis base
subItems.description: This sample is achieved using the axis crossing feature. X-axis 'crossAt' value is set to -2 and hence the data points are rendering from -2. Default axis base value is 0 and on that case, positive points will render upwards and negative points will render downwards.

subItems.title: Area with empty points
subItems.description: This area chart sample renders with gap for null values (empty data points).

subItems.title: Bar width and spacing
subItems.description: You can change the width and spacing of the bars by using the options in the properties panel.

subItems.title: Bar with track
subItems.description: This sample renders the bar chart with track. Track is a rectangular bar drawn from minimum to maximum values of an axis.

subItems.title: Customized bar chart
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates the rendering of custom bars. Here, the bars are filled with images, to look like  pattern fill.

subItems.title: Bubble filled with gradient
subItems.description: This sample depicts the bubble chart filled with gradient colors.

subItems.title: Scatter with various shapes
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates the rendering of a scatter chart with various shapes.

subItems.title: Step line with dashes
subItems.description: A step line chart is rendered with dashes in this sample.

subItems.title: Vertical step line chart
subItems.description: The axes in this sample are transposed to form a vertical step line chart.

subItems.title: List
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates plotting the data which is stored as a list.

subItems.title: JSON
subItems.description: This same demonstrates binding of JSON data to the chart. We saved the JSON data in the file 'chart_data.json' in the assets folder.

subItems.title: Arranged by index
subItems.description: By default, category data points will be arranged based on the x values. In this sample, you can arrange the data points based on the index value.

subItems.title: Date time axis with label format
Chart with annotation
subItems.description: This sample renders the cartesian chart with annotation. A pie chart is rendered as an annotation here.

subItems.title: Chart with watermark
subItems.description: In this sample, annotation is placed at the center of the chart with reduced opacity to form a watermark

subItems.title: Sorting options
subItems.description: This sample depicts the sorting feature in a chart. The data points can be sorted in the ascending or descending order based on the x or y value.

subItems.title: Default tooltip
subItems.description: Tooltip is enabled in this sample and to see the tooltip in action, tap the data points in mobile and hover the data points in the web.

subItems.title: Tooltip position
subItems.description: By changing the options, the tooltip can be made to display in the fixed location or at the pointer location itself.

subItems.title: Tooltip template
subItems.description: This example displays a custom widget as the tooltip. To see the tooltip template, tap the data points in mobile and hover the data points in the web.

subItems.title: Pinch zooming
subItems.description: Pinch zooming and panning is enabled in this sample. Pinch the chart to zoom in and swipe the zoomed chart to pan it. In the web, mouse wheel zooming is also enabled.

subItems.title: Selection zooming
subItems.description: This sample depicts the working of selection zooming. Long press and drag on the chart to select the region for zooming.

subItems.title: Zooming with custom buttons
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates zooming and panning with custom buttons.

subItems.title: Chart with crosshair
subItems.description: The crosshair is enabled in this sample. Tap the chart to show the crosshair and drag the chart to constantly change the crosshair position. On the web, you can move the cursor over the chart area to display the crosshair.

subItems.title: Chart with trackball
subItems.description: The trackball is enabled in this sample. Tap the chart to show the trackball and drag the chart to change the position of the trackball continuously. On the web, you can move the cursor over the chart area to display the trackball.

subItems.title: Selection modes
subItems.description: This sample depicts the selection feature in the chart. Tap the data point to select or unselect in mobile and web click the data points.

subItems.title: Dynamic selection
subItems.description: This sample depicts the dynamic selection feature achieved using the 'selectDataPoints' public method. Choose the series and point index from the dropdown to select or unselect the data points.

subItems.title: Events
subItems.description: Various chart callbacks are enabled in this example. It displays the event trace details while rendering and on performing various interactions.

subItems.title: Real-time spline chart
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates the live chart. A new data point is added at the end and a point is removed at the start in certain time interval continuously.

subItems.title: Vertical live chart
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates the live chart. A new data point is added at the end  in certain time interval continuously.

subItems.title: Add/remove points
subItems.description: Add or remove the data points from a chart using the buttons placed in the sample.

subItems.title: Add/remove series
subItems.description: Add or remove series from the chart using the buttons placed in the sample.

subItems.title: Update data source
subItems.description: The data source bound to this chart can be changed with random values dynamically, by tapping the button placed in this sample.

title: Circular Charts
description: Visualize the data using pie, doughnut, and radial bar charts

subItems.title: Pie with various radius
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates the pie chart with different radius for all the slices. The radius of a slice is based on a numeric value.

subItems.title: Pie with grouping
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates the grouping functionality in a pie chart. Data points values less than the specified value can be grouped together.

subItems.title: Doughnut with center elevation
subItems.description: The doughnut chart is rendered with elevated circle at the center using annotations feature in this sample.

subItems.title: Customized radial bar chart
subItems.description: This sample renders the radial bar chart with annotation at the center and templated legend.

subItems.title: Tooltip
subItems.description: By changing the options, the tooltip can be made to display in the fixed location or at the pointer location itself.

subItems.title: Selection
subItems.description: This sample depicts the selection feature in the chart. Tap the data point to select or unselect in mobile and web click the data points.

subItems.title: Dynamic selection
subItems.description: This sample depicts the dynamic selection feature achieved using the 'selectDataPoints' public method. Choose the point index from the dropdown to select or unselect the data points.

title: Event Calendar
description: Allows you to easily visualize and schedule appointments

title: Radial Gauge
description: Visualize one or multiple measures on a circular scale with pointers and ranges

title: Funnel Chart
description: Visualize the sequential data using funnel chart

title: Pyramid Chart
description: Visualize the organized data using pyramid chart

title: DataGrid
description: Displays large amounts of data with different data types in a tabular view

subItems.title: Custom Header
subItems.description: This sample showcases how to load a widget to a header cell using the headerCellBuilder property. In this sample, the dropdown icon is loaded along with the text to the header cell. If you click the header cell, the popup menu options will be shown. You can sort that specific column or freeze it.

subItems.title: Sorting
subItems.description: This sample demonstrates how to sort one or more columns. In the Web platform, you can sort multiple columns by tapping the column header with the CTRL key where as in a mobile platform you can tap the column headers. It also provides some additional functionalities like Tri-state sorting and displaying sort numbers that indicate the sort order.

subItems.title: Auto Row Height
subItems.description: This sample showcases the auto row height feature of the DataGrid that improves readability of the content. DataGrid provides support to change the height of the row based on its content that changes at run time for all columns or certain columns.

title: Maps
description: Easily visualize data over a geographical area

title: Signature Pad
description: Captures the signature and save it as an image to sync across devices and documents

title: PDF Viewer
description: View the PDF document seamlessly and efficiently

title: XlsIO
description: Create Excel documents with text, numbers, cell formatting, formulas, charts, images, and more

title: Circular ProgressBar
description: Designed using Radial Gauge widget. Indicates the progress of a task with customizable visuals.
